subscribers.php

Summary
subscribers.php
SubscribersList a user’s subscribers
SubscribersActionAction class to display a user’s subscribers
titleFunction that returns the page title
showPageNoticeSubfunction to display the page helper text
showContentSubfunction to display the user’s subscriptions list
showEmptyListMessageSubfunction to display the message when someone doesn’t have any subs
showSectionsStub function that passes up to the parent

Action class to display a user’s subscribers
